name: Heart will heal(kill) you
description:
this little friendly(unfriendly) game is speaking truth(lie)!

Show some love(bullets) to friendly bot!(boss)

platformer shooter 

submission for comunity game jam 2019

wasd = movement

left mouse button = shooting

Monster Laugh.flac
